<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple","explode":false,"description":"Hierarchical path of organization unit handles separated by forward slashes.\nExamples:\n- `engineering` - Lists users in the \"engineering\" OU\n- `engineering/frontend` - Lists users in \"engineering/frontend\"\n","example":"engineering/frontend"},{"in":"query","name":"limit","required":false,"description":"Maximum number of records to return. Must be between 1 and 100 inclusive.\n","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":1,"maximum":100,"default":30}},{"in":"query","name":"offset","required":false,"description":"Number of records to skip for pagination. Must be a non-negative integer.\n","schema":{"type":"integer","minimum":0,"default":0}},{"in":"query","name":"filter","required":false,"description":"Filter users by attribute values.\nSupported operators: eq (ie. equals).\nFormat: `attribute operator \"value\"`.\nExamples:\n- `username eq \"john.doe\"` - Users with username = \"john.doe\"'\n- `age eq 25` - Users with age = 25\n- `address.city eq \"Mountain View\"` - Users with address.city = \"Mountain View\"\n","schema":{"type":"string"},"examples":{"simple-string":{"summary":"Simple string filter","value":"username eq \"john.doe\""},"simple-number":{"summary":"Simple number filter","value":"age eq 25"},"complex":{"summary":"Complex filtering","value":"address.city eq \"Mountain View\""}}}]}
